private and business users of winzip winzip courier winzip self extractor or winzip mac edition that have multiple computing devices eg stand alone computer lap top tablet and mini portable pc may download and install the software on up to three 3 systems per address however the software can only be used by you on one 1 system at a time ie the software may not be shared or used concurrently on different computing devices
